result.title: You are...the cool emoji
result.text: You find it easy to make friends with most people. You are confident and are generally chill about most things. Can we be friends?

result.title: You are...the winky emoji
result.text: You tend to lead with your sense of humor and have a quick wit. You are smart and communicative through ideas as opposed to feelings.

result.title: You are...the poop emoji
result.text: You are a total kook! You're always cracking jokes and acting as the "entertainer". People like to be around you for your fun and uplifting energy.
